Investment in your comfort: pricing and evaluation

We understand that choosing laser hair removal abroad is an important decision. Your treatment experience step by step

Your comfort is our priority. The procedure begins with the application of our advanced cooling system. For the next few minutes, our precision-controlled laser works while you relax comfortably. Most patients describe the treatment as virtually painless, comparing it to a mild cooling sensation.

You'll see immediate results, with visible hair reduction from the first session. Any regrowth will be progressively finer and sparser until permanent elimination is achieved. Most of our patients, including busy travelers, return to their activities immediately after treatment.

Our mission is to help you achieve permanently smooth, hair-free skin. Each treatment is precisely designed around your specific goals and the unique characteristics of your skin and hair type. Experience U.S.-standard care at Colombian prices.

Frequently asked questions about laser hair removal

The number of sessions varies depending on hair type and treatment area. Generally, 6-8 initial sessions are recommended, spaced 4-6 weeks apart, for optimal results. During your free consultation, we'll evaluate your specific case and provide a personalized treatment plan.

No. Our diode laser technology incorporates an advanced cooling system that makes the treatment virtually painless. Most of our patients describe feeling cool sensations and mild tingling, but no pain. The procedure is much more comfortable than waxing or shaving.

Yes, laser hair removal offers permanent results. The laser destroys the hair follicle, preventing future hair growth. After the initial protocol, some people may require occasional maintenance sessions due to hormonal changes, but hair reduction is permanent.

Yes, our diode laser technology is safe and effective for all skin types, even sensitive or tanned skin. The integrated cooling system protects your skin while the laser targets the hair follicle, ensuring safe and effective results.

Duration varies by treatment area. For example, underarms take only 10 minutes, while full legs may take up to 45 minutes. The treatment is quick and efficient, allowing you to immediately return to your daily activities.

Post-treatment care is minimal. We recommend avoiding direct sun exposure for 48 hours, using sunscreen, and keeping the skin hydrated. You can resume normal activities immediately after treatment.
